documents.document: @mr_orgue Like we didn't see that coming... Reckon he's had a fair run? I've found his tenure so far to be a bit...meh.
Dear @Twitter I just want a timeline with most recent tweets at the top. I don't want stuff I missed when I was away and other people likes.
@gordonhighland Blame the vacuum cleaner label...
@gordonhighland For you (since it's Friday here and I think you guys need the laughs right now): https://t.co/MRCrGUwjmI
@JCHart Would never do that (you need to back yourself more!)
@JCHart Great news mate. Congrats! Might pop in and say hi...
@mr_orgue And part of the problem. Again.
@NikKorpon Heh. Me too :-)
@NikKorpon Amazing pics coming through social media!
Is there a shortage of blackberries and raspberries this year? Couldn't find any down at Chaffers market...
I love how the cordless phones in Scream time lock it to the mid-90s #wescraven
@gordonhighland You win the guitar geek of the week award :-)
Summer project... #sunflowers https://t.co/FrgYcznXto
Who can resist a blues song called 'If The Washing Don't Get You, The Rinsing Will'? https://t.co/3TxQ1yMG7x #albertking #Blues
@JCHart You might appreciate this! https://t.co/OjNN8P3Xns
Would anyone pay money for a spinoff show with Dereck Jacobi as The Master?
Oh man, just found out Larry Drake died last year. Did anyone notice among the furore.? #ripBenny
@nocommonswan Aint that the truth!
@nocommonswan Heh, the journey not the destination right? R was keen for lunch, I'll IM if we manage to organise something...
@wigrambrewingco Have you guys stopped making the Vienna Lager?
@nocommonswan You have the perfect life, Scott :-) BTW randomly bumped into Scummy yesterday. He asked after you. Dude has a huge beard!
@JamasEnright We do things differently over in Hataitai... #justsayin
@mr_orgue Thanks! Yes, recipe from Bite (https://t.co/mwmzdj0TNk) and burger bun from Pandoro. Whole thing turned out better than expected.
Who says vegetarian burgers can't cut the mustard? https://t.co/R0WGJGAPT3
For my money the #14 is the most scenic bus route in the city #whywellington
@nocommonswan Nice one! It's a good feeling when an experiment goes right :-)
@mr_orgue That's clearly photoshopped.
Thanks for the free coffee grounds @zenergynz.Great way to help prep the garden before I transplant some seedlings.
@KingArthurFlour Thanks guys! :-)
@karnansaba Yeah, not too bad. Made some exploding ginger beer! Also went to the pool a couple of times. Back to work tomorrow *sigh*.
@karnansaba The string bends are off the hook! You having a good holiday?
Finally a properly shaped baguette! Thanks for the great instructional videos @KingArthurFlour (â€¦ https://t.co/DnWsZsyVfl
@nocommonswan Seen these? https://t.co/wzbjbvXgNK
So any celebrities died yet? #HappyNewYearEveryone
@StuartKBrown Snap! Am listening to that ATM. Like being back in the 90s...
Think I've found my Summer jam: https://t.co/DuKqvZR1A3. Hat-tip to @karnansaba #albertking #Blues
The best way to see a new side of Wellington is to take a different bus route into the CBD #20
@StuartKBrown @girlsHBO Think I first watched that 3 Summers ago. Welcome to the party!
Shake it up baby now #eqnz
@phil_cook A brilliant choice! (And a Merry Xmas to you too).
@mr_orgue Not just me then!
@gordonhighland Nice job G. Love some of the facial expressions (esp in HS and SOS). Like 'Wow, I actually hit that note. Yeah!'.
Bloody good initiative. Ka pai! https://t.co/19jrqUkw0A
@StuartKBrown Believe it... or not...
@mr_orgue Guess that's what happens when you hit the big 5.Looking forward to it regardless!
@mr_orgue We getting WB roundup this year? Reading those make me happy inside :-)
@StuartKBrown Must be a devil between us...
@StuartKBrown So they juice me, seduce me/Dress me up in Stussy #TrickyDaysUntilChristmas
@nocommonswan Am keen to hear :-) PS You going to The Pixies?
@mr_orgue Like. But man, Twitter threads - self indulgent medium subversion or a concise way to nail your point? Jury's still out for me...
@nocommonswan So can we expect a K1500 reunion anytime soon? :-) PS You need to tell peeps you're job hunting so we can keep an eye out...
Download the new Forest & Bird Sustainable fish guide so you can use it when you're out shopping: https://t.co/89GaiGn54s
@edwardjrathke Wow, wish my brain could process that much info!
@edwardjrathke Do you read everythng you retweet? (articles, opinion pieces etc).
@craigwallwork Yeah, I reckon. Beards and bras are a touch combo to pull off...
@mr_orgue That's what went through my mind. Feels out of leftfield and people are scrambling...
@nocommonswan ...and turns into Alvin and the Chipmunks covering Bad Brains :-)
@mr_orgue WTF? Did your house up and move two blocks North? :-)
@pelavia Wow, sorry to hear that PV. Sending good thoughts your way.
@pelavia For real?
And be thankful you didn't try the special sauce... #noir #flashfiction https://t.co/2DHlpm4RfB
@NikKorpon @ShotgunHoney Nice one, Nik. One of aims is to get published with these guys.
@therobertrankin Can you please share the recipe for Treacle Sponge Bastard? :-)
@ChrisCDeal Surprisingly doing ok in a week of quakes, floods and storms. Going to bust out ISOAC for some downtime this wkend. You all gd?
@gordonhighland Found it in my storage unit. Remember wanting something after W&B. Really dug it...
@ChrisCDeal Hey Chris!
@NikKorpon @mandajoon @ChrisCDeal @gordonhighland @boden_steiner @wickerkat 'In Search of a City' - 5 years ago today #greatreads
@monkeywright @craigwallwork @CraigClevenger @pelavia @BobPastorella @edwardjrathke 'In Search of a City' - 5 years ago today #greatreads
@mr_orgue You still at home?
One of the positives that's come out of the 7.5: I'm getting shitloads of writing done (and a little bit of reading ;-)
This playlsit needs more views. You can help: https://t.co/5yxYoj12Ny #hopetounbrown
Ways you can help out after the November earthquakes: https://t.co/A4aFpnzvLD (Pse RT)
Looking at the Kaikoura aftermath pics is bringing home the 7.5 impact. Drove down there late October. Beautiful place.
@JCHart Ha, ironic :-) BTW I'm home over Xmas period if you're in town and want to catch up.
@JCHart Will do. Hope you're not regretting moving down!
@NikKorpon Yeah dude, am ok. Nerves a little shaky. Quake was huge. Thought the house was going to collapse when it hit. Thanks for asking!
@JCHart Know of anywhere we can donate things if needed? ($, food etc)
New Goodbye pork Pie movie trailer: https://t.co/ZD5Va7LBKx
Best thing to do with an overipe, sugary banana: spread it on toast and slide under the grill until it's cooked. Mmmm. #lovefoodhatewaste
@mr_orgue Yeah, good time to know yr neighbours! You got power?
@NikKorpon Hard to know what to think at the moment and now LC has died....
@NikKorpon and we in the Upside Down hearts you also. Stay strong and safe!
@mr_orgue Q: is anyone else doing something similar? (am thinking you don't want to renvent the wheel...)
@mr_orgue Think I read the New Yorker article about the malaria outbreak a while. Sad situation.
@NikKorpon Nice one. Spam some links when they drop as I'm keen to check them out!
@NikKorpon You got a contract with Angry Robots? Nice one!
Getting in early this year â˜º https://t.co/SUmNhVxZGh
@milkshadowbooks Thanks guys!
Duvet sausage roll (how to easily roll/unroll your duvet inner): https://t.co/KZcNoIHaoT
@milkshadowbooks - is your email working at the moment? Got a bounce back when I tried to contact you.
@nocommonswan That cat loves to wander. Glad he made it back home :-)
@craigwallwork You've got the head and shoulders for it :-)
@mr_orgue The book Gods are fickle ;-)
@mr_orgue @paul_scoones I recall loving Conundrum. Am doing selective reads of ones I missed. Dying Days is next. The rest of them?, maybe..
@craigwallwork I want selfies of you as Eleven ;-)
Only took 20 years to complete my NA collection. Anyone got a cheap copy of A Well Mannered War? ;-) https://t.co/HfBrcqGlJO
@nocommonswan That the Dad humour in action again Scott? ;-)
Fuck, for a minute there I thought #bobdylan had passed.
These Dr Who Mr men are pretty neat: https://t.co/uGtwQP2buB
Pleased to report latest speech is sounding good. Phew!
